content:
Hi All,
Generally we create encounters day wise for each patient and for each day we generate claims. But instead of generating claims for each day, Can we generate a single claim attaching it to the Hospitalization encounter??
Can anyone suggest me??Thanks in advance

Any reason not to?
Encounter.partOf is useful to tie daily encounters to the hospitalisation encounter.

Hi @Richard Townley-O'Neill
To just avoid multiple encounters which will be easy to maintain data.

I was too brief. I meant "is there any reason to not generate a single claim attached to the hospitalisation encounter?"
It is possible.
Hi @Richard Townley-O'Neill We just need to avoid creation of multiple encounters and to link each claim generated dialy to Hospitalization encounter.
It's fine to have numerous claims tied to a single encounter if the insurer is fine with it
